attributes.action: Award all Nurses throughout the UK the same pay rise (2.5%) by June 30th 2007.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we call on you to give all UK Nurses  the same pay award as Nurses in Scotland by June 30th 2007.

rejection.details: There are several petitions already up around this area
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
